product.longDescription: Classic performs well in the West Coast region, especially under warmer conditions. The large to extra-large fruits are blocky with flat shoulders. Medium-size plants offer good leaf cover to protect fruits from sunscald. Best for green fruit production. High resistance to bacterial leaf spot races 1–3, 7, and 8, and tobacco mosaic virus. Avg. 68,400 seeds/lb. Packet: 25 seeds.
product.shortDescription: New! Adapted for the West Coast.

Classic (F1) Bell Pepper Seed

Product ID:4336.114336

Classic performs well in the West Coast region, especially under warmer conditions. The large to extra-large fruits are blocky with flat shoulders. Medium-size plants offer good leaf cover to protect fruits from sunscald. Best for green fruit production. High resistance to bacterial leaf spot races 1–3, 7, and 8, and tobacco mosaic virus. Avg. 68,400 seeds/lb. Packet: 25 seeds.
